favourite.article: Oh previous Saviour, we adore Thee. Oh Lord, how we treasure all Thy dear names. Thou are called Jesus, Thou art titled Christ; God's anointed, Thou art also called Emmanuel; God with us, Thou art the Prince of Peace; One Who reconciles us to God, Thou art our Redeemer; In You is our salvation. We worship You Lord and will forever sing thy praise. Amen.
